caption.p: Brain MR images of a grafted patient. A. T2 axial image showing the 2 sites of placement of an NPC suspension in either putamen (circles) at 24 h post-surgery. B. SWAN coronal image showing both implant trajectory paths to either putamen (ellipses) at 1 year postsurgery. C. T2 axial image at 1 year post-surgery showing robust graft outgrowth in the right putamen (circle) in P4 with no topographical abnormalities of the brain structures.
